trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around July 20th 2006
divs: sighting detailsi was laying in my bed trying to take a late afternoon nap when i saw an airplane, and underneath it (far away from it), i saw this object. i thought it was a helium balloon, but it didn't sway or shift in the wind like one. it also was perfectly round w\o no sort of decoration or writing on it and it "trailed" steadily below the airplane! i then opened the gate to my fire-escape window to get a better look and saw it fly back toward downtown, where the airplane seemed to be heading.i lost sight of it b\c it flew over my building. (i live in harlem on 149th street, 6th floor) about 2 minutes later after i called my daughter to come out and look for it and retrieved her camera, i saw a helicopter--not sure what kind, but it was black and it made a couple of rotations in the same area where i saw the object.
